entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:55 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:51 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 1:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: SW 36 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
